Testing VPMAXSW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 32767 -32768 10000 -20000 0 15000 -5000 25000 
Operand B: -32768 32767 -15000 20000 10000 0 -25000 5000 
Result: 32767 32767 10000 20000 10000 15000 -5000 25000 
Expected: 32767 32767 10000 20000 10000 15000 -5000 25000 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 30000 -31000 32000 -31000 -31000 32000 32000 -31000 
Operand B (memory): 29000 -32000 30000 -31000 32000 -31000 -31000 32000 
Result: 30000 -31000 32000 -31000 32000 32000 32000 32000 
Expected: 30000 -31000 32000 -31000 32000 32000 32000 32000 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 
Operand B: 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 
Result: 32767 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 32767 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 32767 32767 -32768 32767 
Expected: 32767 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 32767 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 32767 32767 -32768 32767 
[PASS]

VPMAXSW tests PASSED
